_header: Some men sayen that I am black

CamGon383.First Lines:
Sume men sayonne þat i am blacyt ys a colore for my
                    trow…
CamGon383.Last Lines:
…god kepe hem boþe in feld & toune& þanne
                    schal y be kept ful wel
CamGon383.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope,
                        ed.  
             Secular Lyrics of the XIV and XV Centuries.
         2nd ed. Oxford: Clarendon, 1955: 30-1.
Sisam,  Celia,  and  Kenneth Sisam, eds.  
             The Oxford Book of Medieval English Verse.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1970: 455-6.
Luria,  Maxwell Sidney,  and  Richard L. Hoffman, eds.  
             Middle English Lyrics.
         New York: Norton, 1974: 129.
